items.sentence: Tom said he liked what she had made for dinner, but he was only being polite.
Tom believes that getting married to Mary was the best thing he\'s ever done.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all went to the park to play on the merry-go-round.
Tom has three sisters. One lives in Boston and the other two live in Chicago.
Tom doesn\'t like swimming in pools. He prefers swimming in lakes and rivers.
